messages.msgSnippet: Oh - that s what I thought it was.  I think it s a cool idea.  I ve heard a bit about it over the past year or so.  Rachel s just getting to the normal potty
messages.messageBody:
Oh - that's what I thought it was. I think it's a cool idea. I've heard a bit about it over the past year or so. Rachel's just getting to the 'normal' potty training stage. Probably too late to start with her. I'll check out your links.

Amber

Rachael~
